FeedDemon Is Now Free!

Jan 9, 2008 • Aaron Parker

Great news – the gold standard of RSS/Atom/Feed readers on Windows is now free. I’ve been using FeedDemon for two years now and I can’t praise it enough. The free love continues too, because NewsGator Go! and NetNewsWire are also free.

With FeedDemon, NewsGator Go! and NewsGator Online, I have my feeds synchronised between two laptops, my work desktop and my phone, plus web access available from anywhere. If you’ve been sitting on the fence or looking for a better reading experience, take FeedDemon for a spin.
